text: Blake Hall station is a disused stationLondon's Abandoned Tube Stations - Blake Hall in Essex, formerly on the Central Line of the London Underground"The Central Line" Bruce,J.G;Croome,D.F: Harrow, London Capital Transport, 1996 between North Weald and Ongar.London's Abandoned Tube Stations - Epping to Ongar branch == Notes == Category:Disused London Underground stations Category:1865 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Epping Ongar Railway Category:Former single platform tube stations Category:1981 disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: Blake Hall tube station
